content.query:
select top(100)
vbap.VBELN	
,vbap.POSNR	
,vbap.MATNR	
,vbap.PSTYV	
,vbap.UMZIZ	
,vbap.UMZIN	
,vbap.NETWR	
,vbap.KWMENG	
,vbap.VRKME	
,vbap.WERKS	
,vbap.J_3ASEAN	
,vbak.VBELN	
,vbak.POSNR	
,vbak.ETENR	
,vbak.WMENG	
,vbak.J_3ASIZE	
,vbak.J_3ASZGR	
,vbak.J_3ANETW
,vbep.VBELN	
,vbep.POSNR	
,vbep.ETENR	
,vbep.WMENG	
,vbep.J_3ASIZE	
,vbep.J_3ASZGR	
,vbep.J_3ANETW
from cleansing_data.sap_vbap as vbap   
left join cleansing_data.sap_vbak as vbak on vbap.VBELN = vbak.VBELN
--left join cleansing_data.sap_tvagt  as tvagt on tvagt. = vbap.VRKME
--cleansing_data.sap_t006a
left join cleansing_data.sap_vbep as vbep on 
		vbep.VBELN  = vbap.VBELN  and 
		vbep.POSNR  = vbap.POSNR 
left join cleansing_data.sap_konv  as konv_k  on  konv_k.KNUMV = vbak.KNUMV  
left join cleansing_data.sap_konv  as konv_b  on  konv_b.KPOSN = vbep.POSNR 
---where tvagt.spras = 'P'

 select top(1) *  From cleansing_data.sap_vbak
